name: Garbo
description:
You're a worker at your local package facility, do not put packages on the wrong conveyor belt. Your boss only tells you things once, so you better remember.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Sprint - Shift
Grab - Left Click
Next Level - F
Start Level - P

Credits:
Saspatoon - Models/Textures/Programmer
MetricZero - Models/Other Help

Note:
If you cant pick items up, press the escape key twice to unlock and re-lock your cursor.
